title: Kept
description: He was a completely normal neighbour on the outside. But inside? I was the only one who knew what went on in there. I've sat below this open window for years listening to the enjoyment of the scandalous women he takes home each weekend.I couldn't help but play with myself as I listened. I enjoyed getting off before hitting the town with Sarah. She was a little more adventurous than I was, and we usually went our separate ways, but not tonight. Tonight, she would bring me along on one of her sexcapades.My cravings became much more real after that night. Sarah wasn't around this weekend to help me satisfy them, so I decided to find out exactly what happened on the other side of my neighbour's window... Kept is an explicit story highlighting the following Light BDSM, Billionaires, Dominance, Double Penetration, Foursome (ffmm), Orgasm Denial
author: Jamie Fuchs
